summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of 36th Avenue Southwest, from West Willow Street to West Morgan Street, and from West Myrtle Street on the east to West Myrtle Street on the west, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving, constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 5846, and appropriating money from the Water Fund in aid thereof.
committee: Finance, Streets and Sewers and City Utilities
